subject: Football
September 11 (2001)
lead_paragraph: Because this was a much-anticipated day of reflection and tribute, it would be nice if we could all wait awhile — until Wednesday at least — before declaring the Giants’ season a looming debacle.
snippet: Because this was a much-anticipated day of reflection and tribute, it would be nice if we could all wait awhile — until Wednesday at least — before declaring the Giants’ season a looming debacle.
